tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Rhea has done an excellent Job on designing and fixing multiple bridges and crowns for my mother . The job was challenging considering my moms teeth condition and her age 79 years . Now she is able to eat and chew food properly with great improvement on aesthetics. One of the bridge was having 13 teeth and complex to design , involving multiple root canal treatment was done by her with lot of patience minimising discomforts to patient. Her  caring  attitude for elderly  gives  confidence to patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
She is very attentive to listen to the problems .  She then takes care to make us comfortable on chair with all covid care done protocols. She looks good to problem areas. Her hand at tooth repair bridge fixing and cleaning with tools of her expertise are very comfortable for patients as she never hurts tongue.  She is to quick and takes feedbacks from us at all times during visits. 
I wish all patients must visit her to get experience of their life for a great dental expert like her. She is an awsome amiable and amicable princess like person  too. I pray she is always helping all with tooth problems for long times in our lives. I suggest her to all (as a scientists who can observe understand and infer) that she is a great expert dental orthodontist.
reply_text:
Thank you so much, really means a lot to be appreciated by you.
Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Good Dentist. Very Patiently taking in charge of the problem and solving the tooth issue with full care and also advising how to take care in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* ****** * Very thorough and caring with a magical touch ! Makes you comfortable and feel that you are in safe hands.  Did the procedures effortlessly.  

Well maintained and a neat and clean clinic is another thing worth mentioning here. 

Overall very satisfied and a pleasant experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
reply_text:
Hi, Appreciate you giving your feedback and pointing out a less than pleasant experience at my clinic, I have taken your feedback positively, it is also important for me to give my version for you to know 
your wife had come to get a cap replaced,  for which I advised  her a Zirconia  cap with a CLP-crown  lengthening  procedure,  which  is routinely  done for a tooth with less height, also planned  to cap the adjacent tooth which was treated  by an other  dentist for which cap was not there for few years,  once the cap were cemented on both the tooth She was very happy. 
After 15 days she came with a fractured  tooth  (not the cap )which happens when you don't cap the tooth for a very long time like in her case which you can cross check. 
For which  I advised  a post and core treatment  with a new cap absolutely  free of charge, despite no fault  of mine,  since her tooth had fractured not the cap. 
After taking  her impressions her cap was ready , she complained  that the other cap got decemented  for which I asked her to visit the clinic  immediately  to fix it, she started behaving indifferently and upset assuming my treatment was wrong, I can understand she is not a dentist and so was insisting her to come to the clinic and explain the treatment but she would not listen, I am genuinely sad that a patient who has come to my clinic is not happy with the treatment  but many times there is only that much that you can do to explain things  to a patient. I have 15 years of experience and over 1000 satisfied patients and I would not like to even have a single unhappy patient, I am still open to welcome  her to my clinic and explain the treatment!

I highly recommend her.
